name: Fortune Favors the Buttered
description:
It's not easy raising a hot dog family on your own

A Ludum Dare 44 game by Kathlena Anderson and Whitaker Trebella

Art & Design: Kathlena Anderson

Programming, Sound, Music & Design: Whitaker Trebella

The goal of the game is raise your hot dogs to be the best versions of themselves. The happier the hot dog, the more money you earn.

  •  The happiest hot dogs are Perfectly Even, Perfectly Juicy, and Perfectly Self Confident. 
  • To perform actions on your hot dogs, select a tool, then click the hot dog you want to apply it to.
  • Rotate hot dogs to increase their evenness.
  • Butter hot dog to increase their juiciness.
  • Praise hot dogs to increase their self confidence.
  • Very unhappy dogs will get burnt and die!
